reasoning: Penoscrotal hypospadias represents a more severe anatomical variant of hypospadias. Overall hypospadias incidence is 0.5-8 per 1000 male births (average ~3.5 per 1000 births globally). Penoscrotal location comprises approximately 5-10% of hypospadias cases, estimated at ~1.2 per 100k births.
source: Epidemiology of hypospadias from urological surveys and birth defect registries
